message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a competitive price of $12,000.  I believe it offers significant value, even exceeding its price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is already a competitive price.  To make this work, I can come down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,250. This is my final offer.
